string.value: Lucas introduces you to someone who can train you. #bEast of Amherst#k, you can find #bMai#k. Better head over.
Mai instructs you to hunt #r5 Stumps#k and collect #b3 Tree Branches#k. \n\nStump #r#a10411##k #i4000003# #t4000003# #b#c4000003# #k/3
You managed to hunt 5 Stumps, gather all the branches, and report it all to Mai.
Hey! Lucas send you, right? I'm Mai. I used to fight in Victoria Island, but I hang around here these days, recharging and training. Don't worry, I can make time to help you.
Shall we start? I'll start your training off easy. Ready?

Here. Take this #bRazor#k. It's a type of dagger. It should be slightly more powerful than what you currently have. To hunt well, you need good weapons, so take this one as a gift. Don't forget to #bequip#k it!

Now, go hunt #r5 Stumps#k and bring back #b3 Tree Branches#k. Stumps have a lot of HP, but they're so slow that you shouldn't have too much trouble. Enter the portal to my right to find them. Good luck!
It's dangerous to start training if you aren't mentally prepared. Let me know when you're ready.
You haven't defeated #r5 Stumps#k and brought back #b3 Tree Branches#k yet. Some Stumps drop branches. Others don't. Just be patient and keep hunting.
